data.convo: Can I help you , Madam ? Yes , I'd like to exchange some US dollars into RIB . How much would you like to exchange ? What's the exchange rate for RIB ? It's US 100 for RIB 802 today . I'd like to exchange 3,000 . Fill out this exchange memo , please . Yes . Here you are . Wait a second , please ... These are 24,060 RIB and the receipt , please check them . All right , thank you so much , good-bye . Good-bye .
